pages.text: Caltrops will prove useful, but I have to be strategic as to where I place them. I could try making a moat around my base and put the caltrops at the bottom. I'd have to be careful for monsters digging from below the base, so I should scout for cave systems too.

Mountain-side bases wouldn't be able to have a traditional moat. Either way, it would be wise to mine a perimeter around the mountain-side part of the base and leave a little space between the base and the mountain, so that I can place traps, sort of like a moat for monsters that try digging from inside the mountain.
